entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is described as being very taken with Harry and seems embarrassed when she sees him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as having saved Ginny's life during their previous year at Hogwarts.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is described as holding out his hand solemnly and saying 'How nice to see you' to Harry.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is described as elbowing Percy out of the way and bowing deeply to greet Harry.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is described as pushing Fred aside and seizing Harry's hand in turn.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is described as saying 'That's enough' to her sons when they are being too enthusiastic in greeting Harry.

relationships.description: Ginny seems embarrassed when she sees Harry, indicating a close emotional connection between them.
Percy greets Harry formally by holding out his hand and saying 'How nice to see you'.
Fred greets Harry informally by elbowing Percy out of the way and bowing deeply.
George greets Harry informally by pushing Fred aside and seizing his hand in turn.
Fred greets Mrs. Weasley formally by saying 'Mum' and seizing her hand.
George greets Harry informally by pushing Fred aside and seizing his hand in turn.
